  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x80
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x80
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x56
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (784,0) size 0x19
          text run at (784,0) width 0 RTL: "| "
        LayoutText {#text} at (784,0) size 0x19
          text run at (784,0) width 0: "a"
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,36) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 544x19
          text run at (0,0) width 386: "The line above should have the letter a partially off screen to the "
          text run at (386,0) width 158: "right of the pipe character."
